name: COLORFUNK
description:
Controls: space - dash, mouse - attack. 

ColorFunk - is the action pixel art 2D bullet-hell, where you plays as a character, who has no color, but the world around him is  beatiful and colorful. You need to overcome your fears and complete the game.

The game has custom music, written by me. It's 3 tracks, that I added and also two from other creators.
